name: Slice 'N Dice (SeprAY)
description:
<h5>WEBGL BUILD HAVE ISSUES WITH UI. DOWNLOAD BUILD FOR WINDOWS TO PREVENT UI ISSUES</h5>

Slice n’ Dice is a roguelike, turn-based dungeon crawler where you battle fiendish enemies by rolling die to perform various actions. You will collect cards in between levels that modify your dice rolls in several exciting and interesting ways!

How to play:

It’s simple - you collect cards which will modify your dice rolls in various ways. During battle you will face an enemy, you will attack by rolling dice and having a chance to hit the enemy - and the enemy will do the same. There are many upgrades to try out and also some special die that can be used a finite number of times.

Why are you still here, getting trying! You should pick it up pretty quickly :)

This game was made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam, with the theme being ROLL OF THE DICE. So many thanks to them for providing this great opportunity.
